rows.label: tlk45300143_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Do you find yourself using the
same Blade all the time?

rows.label: tlk45300143_03_msg0003
rows.name:
This mercenary band's a lot bigger than
it used to be. I'm sure you've got a fair
number of Blades working for you.

rows.label: tlk45300143_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I'd advise you to spend time
adventuring with as many Blades
as you can manage.

rows.label: tlk45300143_03_msg0005
rows.name:
That's the best way to grow
as a Driver.
